content: materials - main color 1 of purl soho s nine-note bundles 1 one bundle includes 9 skeins of 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% baby alpaca light worsted/dk-weight yarn each bundle is 900 yards/ 450 grams we used the dragon fruit bundle for one set and the apple bundle for the other set cuff approximately 55 yards required per stocking body approximately 90 yards required per stocking pom pom + hanging loop approximately 40 yards required per stocking - contrast color heel + toe 1 skein of purl soho s note 2 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% baby alpaca yarn each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 200 yards/ 100 grams approximately 30 yards required per stocking we used kiln red and heirloom white with both colors bundles fresh pickle with the dragon fruit bundle and pink sunrise with the apple bundle - a set of us 5 3 75 mm double pointed needles 3 or us 5 32-inch circular needles for magic loop 4 - a set of us 6 4 mm double pointed needles or us 6 32-inch circular needles for magic loop - a crochet hook 5 and scrap yarn for provisional cast on 6 - stitch markers 7 including one unique and one removable - optional purl soho s pom pom maker set 8 small + large size this is enough yarn for at 3 solid stockings or up to 5 if you get creative with stripes to make 3 as shown use a different shade of nine-note for each cuff body and pom pom + hanging loop and 1 skein of note for all the heels + toes we explain how in the pattern or do like we did and use a few different colors of note for variety and holiday cheer gauge 20 stitches and 25 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch on larger circular needles size - finished circumference 12 inches - finished length from top of heel to top of leg 8¾ inches - finished length from bottom of heel to tip of toe 8 inches pattern designed and written by purl soho designer gianna mueller 9 see even more of gianna s work on her instagram 10 1 https //www purlsoho com/nine-note-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/note html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/provisional-cast-on-video/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 8 https //www purlsoho com/pom-pom-maker-set html 9 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 10 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
